details.bio: Oleksandr “s1mple” Kostyliev was born on October 2, 1997 and is currently playing for BC.Game as an AWPer. s1mple is considered by many to be the best Counter-Strike player of all time, a claim that is supported by his many achievements and trophies. His teams have won a Major, an Intel Grand Slam, and many top tier tournaments, while his personal accolades include over 20 HLTV MVP medals, and the number one position in HLTV’s ‘best player of the year’ lists. He was the runner-up in 2019 and 2020.

gear.name: Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2 White
Logitech G PRO X 2 Headset White

details.bio: Nikola “NiKo” Kovač was born on February 16, 1997 and is currently playing for Falcons Esports as a rifler. NiKo is considered by many to be one of the best players in Counter-Strike, putting up fantastic statistics and known for, among other things, his Deagle plays. He has won multiple MVP awards, and has come close to winning HLTV’s best player of the year award (coming in third in 2021 and 2018, and second in 2017).

gear.name: Razer Huntsman V3 Pro TKL 8KHz Green

details.bio: Ilya “m0NESY” Osipov is a Russian professional Counter-Strike 2 player. He is currently playing for Falcons Esports as an AWPer. Born on May 1, 2005, he is considered one of the game’s greatest talents. He was invited to play in FPL (FACEIT’s highest PUG league, where professionals play pickup games) at just 14 years old.

details.bio: İsmailсan “XANTARES” Dörtkardeş is a Turkish professional Counter-Strike 2 player, and is currently playing for Aurora as a rifler. XANTARES is a very popular player, in part due to the fact that he has the ‘XANTARES peek’ named after him. This is a way of peeking where a player wide peeks (thus moving past the angle that an enemy might be holding) and then shoots the enemy almost instantly due to near perfect crosshair placement.
Danil “donk” Kryshkovets is a professional Counter-Strike 2 player who is currently playing for Team Spirit as a rifler.

details.bio: Valerii “b1t” Vakhovskyi is a professional Counter-Strike 2 player from Ukraine who is currently playing for Natus Vincere. Born in 2003 (on January 5th, to be precise) he is viewed as one of the game’s biggest up and coming talents. He was Rookie of the Year in 2021 at the Esports Awards, and was ranked as the 9th best player of 2021, 16th best player of 2022 and 9th best player of 2024 by HLTV.
